#Release notes

= Latest Version=

V1.03:

  # Support add photos from web urls.
  # Fixed some bugs.

= History =

V1.02:

  # Add ATOM feed support.
  # Support anonymous comment.(default OFF)
  # Add photo details info.
  # Add album backup support, u can download all photos in album now.
  # Fixed some bugs.

V1.01:

  # Optimized for GAE new price policy.
  # Blobstore instead of Datastore, free quota up to 5G.
  # Python27 and HRD(High Replication Database) required.
  # Support watermark.(default OFF)
  # Support Hot-linking block. (default OFF)
  # Block all Search-engine, pls change robots.txt if you need.
  
V0.4:

  # Support DragAndDrop upload.
  # Optimize cache using, up to 80% performance improvement.
  # Add cron task to maintain Instance in memory.
  # Fixed some javascript bugs in Albums Manage.
  
V0.3:

  # Increase photo size limit from 1M to 8M.
  # Support multi move/delete photos.

V0.21: Some bugs fixed.

V0.2: Rss feed support.

V0.1: Init release.
